rules_text:
Ward–Discard a card
[i]Slaughter is a game[/i] – Whenever Yuuka becomes blocked, defending player sacrifices a creature blocking it.
[i]Land of Blood[/i] – Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand. This ability triggers only once each turn.
